original_text: “Then they will deliver you up to tribulation and put you to death, and you will be hated by all nations for my name's sake.
korean_text: 그 때에 사람들이 너희를 환난에 넘겨 주겠으며 너희를 죽이리니 너희가 내 이름 때문에 모든 민족에게 미움을 받으리라

sentences.original_text: Then they will deliver you up to tribulation
and you will be hated by all nations
